text:
random and just curious - why is the keyboard shortcut for publish Cmd+shift+P?

Is the thought that you should be extra sure that you want to publish, where as cmd+s to save you don’t need to be as sure?

just wondering the thought behind it as on mac I’m not seeing a conflict with any native or chrome specific functionality
I've mentioned this before but can we have the file name and extension under the thumbnail please? :slightly_smiling_face:
It would be amazing to also have the name of the CTA / ID of the CTA
For some reason when I set a display condition to a field that looks to a boolean, the field will show even if the boolean isn’t checked.
just to prevent confusion could you screenshot the edit modules or previewer screen and note which field is incorrectly displaying
is equal to “true”worked, thanks <@U3A4KEWK1>. I swear leaving it in the default state worked in another build.
Hi everyone, I have a question about the Design Manager's Finder. Is it possible to export the tree structure as a plain text file or csv?
I don’t know of any tool for doing it but if it helps you can now view the same structure via FTP, so if you have an ftp client that can do what your saying then that could do the trick.
Ah, thanks. I'll look into that solution
How can we edit alt text on blog single posts and blog listing page for featured image? It seems to be applied automatic from file manager whichever it names itself.
